mapper.select: select type, r.id, p.pname, p.id reportId ,to_char(r.input_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') inputDate, rcode from report r , product p where p.pcode=r.pcode and rcode='${rcode}'
mapper.update: update product set pcancel='C' where pcode=(select r.pcode from report r , product p where p.pcode=r.pcode and rcode=#{rcode})
